text: Harish Viswanathan from the Bell Labs, Alcatel-Lucent, New Providence, NJ, was named Fellow of the Institute of Electrical and Electronics Engineers (IEEE) in 2013 for contributions to wireless communication systems. ==Education== *PhD in Electrical Engineering from Cornell University, 1997 *Master of Science in Electrical Engineering from Cornell University, 1995 *Bachelor of Technology in Electrical Engineering from the Indian Institute of Technology Madras in 1992 == References == Category:Fellow Members of the IEEE Category:Living people Category:Cornell University College of Engineering alumni Category:Chief technology officers Category:Indian Institute of Technology Madras alumni Category:Year of birth missing (living people)
title: Harish Viswanathan
